rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception area, Vastu aligned to ensure positive energy flow. Features include an open layout for easy movement.
Open plan living area integrated with the dining space. Vastu alignment emphasizes clarity and balance, designed to be in the east.
Dedicated home gym designed for functional workouts. Located in the north-east to harness positive energy, Vastu compliant with appropriate ventilation.
Dedicated office space designed for productivity. Placed in the north to ensure focus, with sound insulation and ample natural light.
Functional kitchen designed with a Vastu-compliant layout, ideally located in the south-east for enhanced positivity. Features modern appliances and storage solutions.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom, designed for relaxation and optimal rest. Vastu principles recommend the south-west direction to encourage deep sleep.
Well-appointed guest bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Placed in the west for calm, aligning with Vastu principles.
Complementary guest bathroom designed to maintain privacy and convenience. Vastu-compliant placement ensures balanced energy.
Dedicated service area for storage, utilities, and laundry. Positioned in the north-west to maintain balance as per Vastu norms.
Room for electrical panels, water tanks, and other maintenance utilities. Vastu-compliant location in the north-west supports balanced energy.

openings.description: Grand entrance door designed with Vastu guidelines, ensuring the flow of positive energy from the east.
Strategically placed windows for optimal ventilation and natural light. Vastu principles ensure each opening enhances the room's energy.
Glass partition to maintain an open feel while segregating spaces as per Vastu norms. Enhances the visual flow.
